sqlroot.sql: SELECT C.ID, C.MENU_NAME, C.MENU_ALIAS, C.MENU_URL, C.SERIAL_NUM, C.ISSHOW, C.DESCRIPTION, IFNULL(D.TOTALCOUNT, 0) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM T_SYS_MENU C LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.ID, COUNT(1) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM T_SYS_MENU A JOIN (SELECT ID FROM T_SYS_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = :parentMenuId) B ON B.ID = A.PARENT_MENU_ID GROUP BY B.ID) D ON D.ID = C.ID WHERE C.PARENT_MENU_ID = :parentMenuId ORDER BY C.SERIAL_NUM

SELECT A.ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_URL FROM T_SYS_MENU A JOIN (SELECT C.MENU_ID FROM T_SYS_ACL C JOIN T_SYS_USERSROLES D ON D.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID WHERE D.USER_ID = :userId AND C.OPERATE_STATUS & 8 = 8 GROUP BY C.MENU_ID) B ON B.MENU_ID = ID WHERE A.ISSHOW = 1 AND A.PARENT_MENU_ID = :parentMenuId ORDER BY A.SERIAL_NUM

sql.name: system.menu.getMainFrame
sql.desc: 根据父id递归查询叶子节点

sqlroot.sql: SELECT A.ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_ALIAS, A.MENU_URL, A.PARENT_MENU_ID FROM (SELECT ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_ALIAS, MENU_URL, PARENT_MENU_ID, SERIAL_NUM FROM T_SYS_MENU WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ID, START_WITH_PRIOR_MENU(:parentMenuId)) AND ISSHOW = 1 AND ID <> 0) A JOIN (SELECT C.MENU_ID FROM T_SYS_ACL C JOIN T_SYS_USERSROLES D ON D.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID WHERE D.USER_ID = :userId AND C.OPERATE_STATUS & 8 = 8 GROUP BY C.MENU_ID) B ON B.MENU_ID = A.ID ORDER BY A.PARENT_MENU_ID, A.SERIAL_NUM

sql.name: system.menu.getNodePosition
sql.desc: 根据id获取该节点所在位置

sql.name: system.acl.getAclAndMenu
sql.desc: 根据父id和roleId查询子菜单和操作权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT E.ID, E.MENU_NAME, E.TOTALCOUNT, IFNULL(F.OPERATE_STATUS, 0) OPERATE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.ID, C.MENU_NAME, IFNULL(D.TOTALCOUNT, 0) TOTALCOUNT, C.SERIAL_NUM FROM T_SYS_MENU C LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.ID, COUNT(1) TOTALCOUNT FROM T_SYS_MENU A JOIN (SELECT ID FROM T_SYS_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = :parentMenuId) B ON B.ID = A.PARENT_MENU_ID GROUP BY B.ID) D ON D.ID = C.ID WHERE C.PARENT_MENU_ID = :parentMenuId) E LEFT JOIN (SELECT MENU_ID, OPERATE_STATUS FROM T_SYS_ACL WHERE ROLE_ID = :roleId) F ON F.MENU_ID = E.ID ORDER BY E.SERIAL_NUM

sql.name: system.acl.getOperateStatus
sql.desc: 根据用户id和菜单id查看操作权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT A.OPERATE_STATUS FROM T_SYS_ACL A JOIN T_SYS_USERSROLES B ON B.ROLE_ID = A.ROLE_ID WHERE A.MENU_ID = :menuId AND B.USER_ID = :userId

sql.name: system.acl.getAclListByUserId
sql.desc: 根据用户id查看拥有的权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT C.MENU_ALIAS, A.OPERATE_STATUS FROM T_SYS_ACL A JOIN T_SYS_USERSROLES B ON B.ROLE_ID = A.ROLE_ID JOIN T_SYS_MENU C ON C.ID = A.MENU_ID WHERE B.USER_ID = :userId AND C.MENU_ALIAS IS NOT NULL
